<template lang="pug">
transition(name="slide")
    #app
        keep-alive
            router-view(v-if="$route.meta.keepAlive")
        router-view(v-if="!$route.meta.keepAlive")
    //- keep-alive
    //-     router-view#app(v-if="$route.meta.keepAlive")
    //- router-view#app(v-else)
    //- keep-alive
    //-     router-view#app
</template>

<script>
    import Vue from 'vue';

    const name = 'page-wrapper';

    export default {

        name,

        data(){
            return {};
        },

        mounted(){

            // 引入 fastclick.js
            // 已知bug: fastclick 造成表单(输入框)不易获取焦点
            // import(
            //     /* webpackChunkName: "fastclick" */
            //     '%src%/common/fastclick.js'
            // ).then(module => {
            //     module.default();
            //     FastClick.attach(document.body);
            // });

            console.log(navigator.userAgent);

            window.Vue = Vue;

            // 如果执行环境是APP，则初始化 APP JS SDK
            if(this.userAgent.indexOf('com.bankcomm.maidanba') >= 0){
                Vue.$mdb.initSDK();

                // 引入 fastclick.js
                // 已知bug: fastclick 造成表单(输入框)不易获取焦点
                import(
                    /* webpackChunkName: "fastclick" */
                    '%src%/common/fastclick.js'
                ).then(module => {
                    module.default();
                    FastClick.attach(document.body);
                });
            }


            // // 禁止缩放
            // (function(){
            //     var lastTouchEnd = 0;
            //     document.addEventListener('touchstart', function(event) {
            //         if (event.touches.length > 1) {
            //             event.preventDefault();
            //         }
            //     });
            //     document.addEventListener('touchend', function(event) {
            //         var now = (new Date()).getTime();
            //         if (now - lastTouchEnd <= 450) {
            //             event.preventDefault();
            //         }
            //         lastTouchEnd = now;
            //     }, false);

            //     // 阻止双指放大
            //     document.addEventListener('gesturestart', function(event) {
            //         event.preventDefault();
            //     });
            // })();

            // 设置默认主题色
            // let ele = document.createElement('div');
            // ele.classList.add('tmp-theme-check');
            // document.body.appendChild(ele);
            // let theme = getComputedStyle(ele, ':after').getPropertyValue('content');
            // document.body.removeChild(ele);
            // console.log(theme);
            // Vue.$mdb.setTheme(theme);
        },
    };
</script>

<style lang="scss">
    html {
        height: 100%;
    }
    body {
        margin: 0;
        height: 100%;
        background-color: #fff;
        overflow: hidden;
    }
    @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
        body {
            background-color: #000;
        }
    }
    #app {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    // 临时用于深色主题检测
    .tmp-theme-check {
        position: fixed;
        z-index: -10000;
        width: 0;
        height: 0;
        opacity: 0;
    }
    .tmp-theme-check:after {
        content: "light";
    }
    @media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
        .tmp-theme-check:after {
            content: "dark";
        }
    }
</style>
